English.Text: Hell indeed. Whether the volunteer lacked faith or the Lord lacked attention, it is only for Him to know. The man enters the engine room and can hardely touch the leaking valve before the steam devours him, large blisters feeding on his flesh while the whistling valve cover his sceams. There is no distinguishing the man's agony from the machinery's cries, and the door is hurriedly sealed shut. The inhumane shrieks continue to resound through the ship for the rest of the trip.
